content: red heart pattern # lw5080 skill level intermediate throw measures approximately 44 112 cm x 56 142 cm including edging gauge 6 blocks = 4 10 cm 6 row = 4 10 cm in stitch pattern exact gauge is not critical for this project red heart® classic™ 4 skeins each 917 cardinal a and 401 nickel c and 2 skeins each 584 lavender b and 412 silver d
